actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize construction of the Gregory pumped-storage hydroelectric dam and reservoir.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Corps of Engineers, to construct an adjacent-type pumped-storage hydroelectric dam as part of the Fort Randall Dam-Lake Francis Case project, South Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of the Gregory pumped-storage hydroelectric dam and reservoir.
